org.xflatdb.xflat.db

Class TableMetadataFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.db.TableMetadataFactory

  • public class TableMetadataFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A Factory which creates TableMetadata instances.

      Creates a new TableMetadataFactory with the given dependencies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableMetadataFactory

        public TableMetadataFactory(XFlatDatabase db,
                    java.io.File metadataDirectory)
        Creates a new TableMetadataFactory with the given dependencies.
        Parameters:
        db - The XFlatDatabase from which dependencies are retrieved when engines are provided.
        wrapper - The metadata directory to which the factory should read and save table metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadataDoc

        public org.jdom2.Document getMetadataDoc(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the metadata document for the given table name.
        Parameters:
        name - The table name for which to get the metadata document.
        Returns:
        A Document representing the metadata associated to the table.

      • makeTableMetadata

        public TableMetadata makeTableMetadata(java.lang.String name,
                              java.io.File engineFile)
        Creates a TableMetadata for the given engine. This TableMetadata object does not have the ID generator or table config, so it can function only as an EngineProvider. Do not call TableMetadata.getTable(java.lang.Class) on the resulting object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the table.
        engineFile - The file where the engine data should be stored.
        Returns:
        A new TableMetadata object.

      • makeTableMetadata

        public TableMetadata makeTableMetadata(java.lang.String name,
                              java.io.File engineFile,
                              TableConfig config,
                              java.lang.Class<?> idType)
        Creates a TableMetadata for the given table information.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the table
        engineFile - The file locating the engine.
        config - The configuration of the table, null to use TableConfig#defaultConfig
        idType - The type of the ID property for the table.
        Returns:
        A table metadata for the given table.

      • saveTableMetadata

        public void saveTableMetadata(TableMetadata metadata)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the given metadata to disk.
        Parameters:
        metadata - The metadata to save.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
